str2: As far as, up to, until, during. Or achris akh'-rece; akin to akron; until or up to.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Feminine Singular

str2: A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To take up, raise; I pick up, take on board; I carry off, lead away. From ana and lambano; to take up.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To give orders (injunctions, instructions, commands). From en and the base of telos; to enjoin.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From apostello; a delegate; specially, an ambassador of the Gospel; officially a commissioner of Christ.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To pick out for myself, choose, elect, select. Middle voice from ek and lego; to select.
